Eclipse Forum¶

insert_forum(project_id, forum_name, type)[source]¶

inserts forum to DB

Parameters:
  • project_id (int) – project id
  • forum_name (str) – forum name
  • type (str) – forum type (Eclipse forum, Bugzilla)
insert_message(own_id, pos, type, topic_id, body, votes, author_id, created_at)[source]¶

inserts message to DB

Parameters:
  • own_id (int) – data source message id
  • pos (int) – position of the message in the topic
  • type (str) – type of the message (question, reply)
  • topic_id (int) – DB topic id
  • body (str) – message body
  • votes (int) – number of votes received
  • author_id (int) – id of the author
  • created_at (str) – creation time of the message
insert_message_attachment(url, own_id, name, extension, size, message_id)[source]¶

inserts attachment of a message

Parameters:
  • url (str) – url of the attachment
  • own_id (int) – id in the data source
  • name (str) – name of the attachment
  • extension (str) – extension of the attachment
  • size (int) – size of the attachment in bytes
  • message_id (int) – message id of the attachment
insert_topic(own_id, forum_id, title, views, last_change_at)[source]¶

inserts topic to DB

Parameters:
  • own_id (int) – data source topic id
  • forum_id (int) – forum id
  • title (str) – title of the topic
  • views (int) – number of views of the topic
  • last_change_at (str) – last change date

updates views and last change date

Parameters:
  • topic_id (int) – DB topic id
  • forum_id (int) – DB forum id
